Ivory Tower Wizard Rombel:
If you want to meet with the Ancient Giants of the Tower the Marshlands, You have reached the right place. Ahem... Among the Wizards of the Ivory Tower I know best how to meet Ancient Giants. (Coughs.)
On the 2nd floor of the Tower the Marshlands have a device with which you can meet with them. Ahem... But this device is broken. First, it is necessary to repair and run.
I can tell You how to do it. Ahem...
